statements.text: I value integrity, honesty, and doing the right thing
I value kindness, generosity and connection.
I value achievement, efficiency and success.
I value authenticity, originality, and emotional depth
I value knowledge, privacy and self-reliance
I value loyalty, dependability, and being prepared
I value freedom, adventure and possibilities.
I value strength, resilience and assertiveness
I value harmony, peace and comfort.
I feel happiest when things or people live up to the high standards I hold.
I feel happiest when I’m helping others and making them feel loved.
I feel happiest when people see me as competent and successful.
I feel happiest when I find deep meaning in beauty, art, and self-expression.
I feel happiest when I have enough knowledge and resources.
I feel happiest and at ease when I can rely on others to be consistent and dependable.
I feel happiest when I'm excited by new ideas, experiences, and possibilities.
I feel happiest when I'm strong and independent.
I feel happiest when things are peaceful and everyone gets along.
I focus on doing things the right way and avoiding mistakes.
I focus on other people’s needs and how I can be helpful.
I focus on accomplishing tasks and enjoy being productive. It can be difficult for me to slow down.
I focus on my inner emotional world and authentic self-expression.
I focus on gaining knowledge and understanding how things work.
I focus on finding reliable support and being aware of risks, dangers, or threats.
I focus on interesting activities, keeping my options open and maintaining freedom.
I focus on being direct and standing up for what I believe in.
I focus on keeping the peace and excel at mediating or avoiding conflicts.
